body_html: So, if I read the perf numbers correctly, the forwards for sparse sum with dimensions specified is 20x slower than full sum, and the backwards is 2x slower. Do we know how this compares to the perf difference for, e.g., dense sum?
body_text: So, if I read the perf numbers correctly, the forwards for sparse sum with dimensions specified is 20x slower than full sum, and the backwards is 2x slower. Do we know how this compares to the perf difference for, e.g., dense sum?
body: So, if I read the perf numbers correctly, the forwards for sparse sum with dimensions specified is 20x slower than full sum, and the backwards is 2x slower. Do we know how this compares to the perf difference for, e.g., dense sum?
